General.Name: Carboclor
General.Description: Carboclor S.A. provides port, storage, and logistics services in Argentina. The company offers loading and unloading of ships, barges, trucks, and containers; dispatch of products in trucks; transfer of products from containers to tank trucks; heating of products in trucks and containers; laboratory services; and dock crane for loading food, lubricants, and spare parts to ships. It is also involved in the engages in the production and marketing of chemical, petrochemical, and petroleum products. Carboclor S.A. was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Campana, Argentina. Carboclor S.A. is a subsidiary of Ancsol S.A.
